translationnotifications-talkpage-body:
Agoo
 $2,

Fo nyɛrɛ la a teɛre-ma ŋa bonso a fo because you {{GENDER:$1|saane kpɛ}} a e leɛraa {{PLURAL:$9|te tɔ}} $3 a {{SITENAME}}.
A paagyi [[$4]] be be la ko leɛroo. Fo naŋ toɔŋ leɛre o la a kyɛ:
$5

$6
$7

$8

A fo sommo taa la bareka puubu. Leɛreba boɔrɔ la a fo sommo{{SITENAME}} a toŋ neŋ aŋa nemtɛɛtɛɛ a paaloŋ poɔ.

Ka foo naŋ yi bee leɛre a fo teɛre-ma yele a leɛroo poɔ,sɔroo la kaa nyɛ [$10 meŋɛ: leɛra saane].

Bareka!

{{SITENAME}} leɛroo zukaareba
